text: Meri naani, Amma, hamesha Ayurvedic ilaajon ki qasam khaati theen. Onam ke dauraan, bahut zyaada lazeez payasam khane ke baad, woh hazme ke liye adrak aur lemon ka ark tajweez karti theen. Mujhe yaad hai ke Kerala mein hamare ghar se taqreeban 50 km door ek chote se clinic mein jaana, jahan ek Vaidya ne herbal tailon se unke jodon ke dard ka ilaaj kiya. Isse kamaal hua! Tab se main zyada holistic tareeqon ko explore kar rahi hoon. Kya kisi ne Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala mein ilaaj azmaaya hai?
